name: Hyper Disk
description:
RULES:

  • Hitting a robot gives you 10 points;
  • Hitting more than one with a single throw multiplies the accumulated points;
  • Points are added to your score only when you catch the disc;
  • The disc cannot leave the game area;
  • The disc will bounce off the orange penalty zones;
  • You can cross the orange penalty zones, but the robots cannot;
  • The disc can only be recalled if it is stopped or about to stop;
  • Recalling the disc will reset the combo multiplier;
  • Staying in a penalty zone for 2 seconds or more is a foul;
  • Getting caught by a robot is a foul;
  • Accumulating three consecutive fouls ends the game;

CONTROLS:

LMB = Throw Disc with Counter-Clockwise Spin
RMB = Throw Disc with Clockwise Spin
MMB = Throw Disc with No Spin
SPACE = Recall Disc
